document.full_text: an al jazeera journalist who was detained in syria three weeks ago and sent to iran, said after being released and flown to qatar on wednesday that she could hear beatings "almost around the clock" in her syrian jail.
document.title: jazeera reporter held in syria says heard beatings
lines_and_colors: an al jazeera journalist who was detained in syria three weeks ago and sent to iran, said after being released and flown to qatar on wednesday that she could hear beatings "almost around the clock" in her syrian jail.
